data.name: Abbey of Kings
data.description: Heals all nearby friendly units that are out of combat by +6 every %2.1% seconds.

variations.name: Abbey of Kings
variations.description: Heals all nearby friendly units that are out of combat by +6 every %2.1% seconds.

data.name: Archery Range
data.description: Produces ranged infantry units.

influences: Buildings gain the Emergency Repairs ability while within the influence of a Town Center.
Unit production costs reduced by -20% when within the influence of a Keep.

variations.description:
Produces ranged infantry units.
Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.
influences: Buildings generate +100% tax while within the influence of the Imperial Academy.
The research rate of buildings within influence of a Mosque or a Madrasa is increased for each garrisoned Scholar in all Mosques and Madrasas.

Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age.

Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Unit production produces two units instead of one.
Military unit production rate increased +25%/+33%/+40% by Age while within the influence of a Blacksmith or University. The Istanbul Observatory increases the bonus to +60%.

data.name: Capital Town Center
data.description: All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers and Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.

variations.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers and Scouts, and increases your Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles Bonus: Triggers an alarm when an enemy approaches, causing nearby units and defensive buildings to fire faster while the alarm is active.
All resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and Prelates and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
influences: Buildings gain the Emergency Repairs ability while within the influence of a Town Center.

variations.description: All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and Officials and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.

influences:

data.name: Farm
data.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.

variations.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.
Farm Enclosure technology is available from the Mill upon entering the Imperial Age (IV). Farm Enclosures generate 1 Gold every 8 seconds when worked by a Villager.
influences: Farm harvest rate increased +15%/+20%/+25%/+30% by Age while within the influence of a Mill.

data.name: House
data.description: Increases your maximum Population.

influences: Buildings gain the Emergency Repairs ability while within the influence of a Town Center.

Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age.

variations.description: Increases your maximum Population by 5. Malian Houses cost half as many resources as standard.
influences: The Gold extraction rate of Open Pit Mines is increased by +25% for each House or Mining Camp built within the influence.

data.name: Stone Wall
data.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 66% less damage from ranged attacks and their range is increased by +2.

data.name: Stone Wall Gate
data.description:
Heavy defensive gate. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the gate to access the top of the walls.

data.name: Stone Wall Tower
data.description:
Heavy defensive tower that fires a springald. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the tower to access the top of the walls.

variations.description: Automatically produces Tower Elephants. Garrison up to 4 Scholars in the Landmark to increase production speed.

data.name: Tower of Victory
data.description: Enables Tower of Victory, Mosques, and Madrasas to increase the attack speed of infantry by +20% when produced within their influence.

variations.name: Tower of Victory
variations.description: Enables Tower of Victory, Mosques, and Madrasas to increase the attack speed of infantry by +20% when produced within their influence.

data.name: House of Wisdom
data.description:
Contains civilization technology for the Abbasid Dynasty.
Abbasids advance in Ages through the House of Wisdom. Construct wings to advance to the next Age and gain additional technology.

variations.name: House of Wisdom
variations.description:
Contains civilization technology for the Abbasid Dynasty.
Abbasids advance in Ages through the House of Wisdom. Construct wings to advance to the next Age and gain additional technology.
influences:
Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age.

data.name: Prayer Hall of Uqba
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

variations.name: Prayer Hall of Uqba
variations.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.
influences:
Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age.

data.name: Cattle Ranch
data.description: Cattle garrisoned in this ranch will generate +28 Food per minute.

variations.name: Cattle Ranch
variations.description: Cattle garrisoned in this ranch will generate +28 Food per minute.

data.name: Farimba Garrison
data.description: Quickly produces Barracks and Archery Range units 5 at a time. Unit cost is converted to Gold and reduced by -20%.

variations.name: Farimba Garrison
variations.description: Quickly produces Barracks and Archery Range units 5 at a time. Unit cost is converted to Gold and reduced by -20%.

data.name: Fort of the Huntress
data.description:
Acts as a Keep. Infantry units nearby the Landmark enter Stealth for 10 seconds.
Musofadi Warriors and Musofadi Gunners gain First Strike, dealing more damage when breaking Stealth with an attack.

variations.name: Fort of the Huntress
variations.description:
Acts as a Keep. Infantry units nearby the Landmark enter Stealth for 10 seconds.
Musofadi Warriors and Musofadi Gunners gain First Strike, dealing more damage when breaking Stealth with an attack.

data.name: Grand Fulani Corral
data.description: Nearby cattle provide 20 Food per minute.

variations.name: Grand Fulani Corral
variations.description: Nearby cattle provide 20 Food per minute.

data.name: Great Mosque
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

variations.name: Great Mosque
variations.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

data.name: Griot Bara
data.description: Begin a festival for 300 Gold, providing global enhancements to Food gather rates, military production speeds, or damage of torches and siege attacks. One festival may be active at a time.

variations.name: Griot Bara
variations.description: Begin a festival for 300 Gold, providing global enhancements to Food gather rates, military production speeds, or damage of torches and siege attacks. One festival may be active at a time.

data.name: Mansa Quarry
data.description: Generates 75 Gold per minute. Can be toggled to generate Stone instead.

variations.name: Mansa Quarry
variations.description: Generates 75 Gold per minute. Can be toggled to generate Stone instead.

data.name: Pit Mine
data.description:
Must be built on a Gold Vein.
Mines 35 Gold per minute without depleting the deposit. If a deposit has been depleted, the Pit Mine can be re-placed on exhausted Gold Veins.

variations.name: Pit Mine
variations.description:
Must be built on a Gold Vein.
Mines 35 Gold per minute without depleting the deposit. If a deposit has been depleted, the Pit Mine can be re-placed on exhausted Gold Veins.
influences: The Gold extraction rate of Open Pit Mines is increased by +25% for each House or Mining Camp built within the influence.

data.name: Saharan Trade Network
data.description:
Acts as a Toll Outpost that comes with Defensive Arrowslits technology researched.
All Traders and Trade Ships taxed will generate Food equal to the taxed Gold at this Landmark. All other Toll Outposts will generate 50% of taxed Gold as Food.

variations.name: Saharan Trade Network
variations.description:
Acts as a Toll Outpost that comes with Defensive Arrowslits technology researched.
All Traders and Trade Ships taxed will generate Food equal to the taxed Gold at this Landmark. All other Toll Outposts will generate 50% of taxed Gold as Food.

data.name: Toll Outpost
data.description:
Offers extensive line of sight. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
Passing Traders and Trade Ships instantly provide an additional 10% of their carried Gold.

variations.name: Toll Outpost
variations.description:
Offers extensive line of sight. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
Passing Traders and Trade Ships instantly provide an additional 10% of their carried Gold.

data.name: Deer Stones
data.description:
Deer Stones instantly researches the Yam Network technology, increasing move speed by +15% to all units when within range of Outposts and the landmark.
Does not apply to siege engines.

variations.name: Deer Stones
variations.description:
Deer Stones instantly researches the Yam Network technology, increasing move speed by +15% to all units when within range of Outposts and the landmark.
Does not apply to siege engines.

data.name: Ger
data.description:
Villagers can drop off Food, Wood, and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve resource gathering.
Stone is gathered through Ovoos.

variations.name: Ger
variations.description:
Villagers can drop off Food, Wood, and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve resource gathering.
Stone is gathered through Ovoos.
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Researches have improved effect.

data.name: Khaganate Palace
data.description: Spawns a cavalry army of Horsemen, Mangudai, or Lancers every 90 seconds.

variations.name: Khaganate Palace
variations.description: Spawns a cavalry army of Horsemen, Mangudai, or Lancers every 90 seconds.

data.name: Kurultai
data.description: Heals nearby units within its aura by +1 every 1 second. Activates an additional +25% damage to all units when the Khan comes within range.

variations.name: Kurultai
variations.description: Heals nearby units within its aura by +1 every 1 second. Activates an additional +25% damage to all units when the Khan comes within range.

data.name: Monument of the Great Khan
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

variations.name: Monument of the Great Khan
variations.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

data.name: Ovoo
data.description:
Must be built on a Stone Outcropping.
Harvests 80/100/120/150 Stone per minute by Age. Houses unique Mongol technologies.
Constructing a new Ovoo will destroy the prior one.

variations.name: Ovoo
variations.description:
Must be built on a Stone Outcropping.
Harvests 80/100/120/150 Stone per minute by Age. Houses unique Mongol technologies.
Constructing a new Ovoo will destroy the prior one.
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Unit production produces two units instead of one.
- Researches have improved effect.
- Pastures produce sheep faster.

data.name: Pasture
data.description: Automatically produces a gatherable Sheep every 120 seconds. Will eventually stop producing if too many Sheep are produced and not gathered.

variations.name: Pasture
variations.description: Automatically produces a gatherable Sheep every 120 seconds. Will eventually stop producing if too many Sheep are produced and not gathered.
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Pastures produce sheep faster.

data.name: Prayer Tent
data.description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.

influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Unit production produces two units instead of one.
- Researches have improved effect.

data.name: Istanbul Observatory
data.description: Acts as a University. Improves the influence provided by the University and Blacksmith to +60%.

variations.name: Istanbul Observatory
variations.description: Acts as a University. Improves the influence provided by the University and Blacksmith to +60%.
influences: Military unit production rate increased +25%/+33%/+40% by Age while within the influence of a Blacksmith or University. The Istanbul Observatory increases the bonus to +60%.

data.name: Mehmed Imperial Armory
data.description: Produces siege engines for free but with a longer train time.

variations.name: Mehmed Imperial Armory
variations.description: Produces siege engines for free but with a longer train time.
influences: Military unit production rate increased +25%/+33%/+40% by Age while within the influence of a Blacksmith or University. The Istanbul Observatory increases the bonus to +60%.

data.name: Military School
data.description: The Military School can be assigned to produce one type of unit continuously at no cost, however they are produced at a slower rate.

data.description:
Well-built defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 15 Wood, with each additional section costing 5 Wood.

data.name: High Trade House
data.description:
Generates Gold like a Hunting Cabin with the value increased by +400%. Spawns a Huntable Deer every 60 seconds.
Villagers can drop off Food at this building.

variations.name: High Trade House
variations.description:
Generates Gold like a Hunting Cabin with the value increased by +400%. Spawns a Huntable Deer every 60 seconds.

data.name: Hunting Cabin
data.description:
Villagers can drop off Food at this building. It houses technologies to improve Food gathering and produces Scouts.
Generates Gold based on the number of nearby trees. Gold rate decreased when player owned Hunting Cabins are placed too close together.

variations.name: Hunting Cabin
variations.description:
Villagers can drop off Food at this building. It houses technologies to improve Food gathering and produces Scouts.
Generates Gold based on the number of nearby trees. Gold rate decreased when player owned Hunting Cabins are placed too close together.

data.name: Kremlin
data.description: Acts as a Wooden Fortress that comes with Arrowslits, Castle Turret, and Castle Watch technologies.

variations.name: Kremlin
variations.description: Acts as a Wooden Fortress that comes with Arrowslits, Castle Turret, and Castle Watch technologies.
influences: Lumber Camps and Town Centers within the influence of a Wooden Fortress return 20% more Wood.

data.description:
Acts as a Keep with all weapon emplacements and increased health.
Unlocks the building of Stone Walls, Stone Gates, and Stone Wall Towers.

variations.description:
Acts as a Keep with all weapon emplacements and increased health.

variations.name: The Golden Gate
